Author: VirideGliridae
Text: As long as you can. I had a tooth out a while ago and waited like 2 weeks, which...was hell, since I was right in the middle of a big ol' purge fest, but I was in a lot of pain and was super paranoid about dry socket so I made it somehow. It really depends on what you got done, but throwing up risks damaging the work/causing complications. Also if there was any damage done to the bone/gums etc in your mouth you really need the calories to help it heal properly anyways - it'll heal sooner the less stress your body is under.
